flawed_nl_solution:
The time the singer had for singing was 80 - 10 = <<80-10=40>>40 minutes.
The time the singer had for singing 5-minute songs was 40 - 10 = 30 minutes.
The number of 5-minute songs was 30 / 5 = <<30/5=6>>6 songs.
The total number of songs sung is 6 + 1 = <<6+1=7>>7 songs.
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
